data.title: The Elder Scrolls Novel by Greg Keyes
data.meta_description:
Reeling from a devastating discovery Prince Attrebus continues on his seemingly doomed quest to obtain a magic sword that holds the key to destroying the deadly invaders. Meanwhile in the Imperial City the spy Colin finds evidence of betrayal at the heart of the empire  if his own heart doesnt betray him first.


Condition : New

Author : Greg Keyes

Weight : 250

Publisher : Titan Books Ltd

Language : English

EAN : 9780857680877

ISBN10 : 0857680870

Format : Paperback  Softback

Date of Publication : 20121026

Place of Publication : United Kingdom

Pagination : 320 Pages

Dimensions : 172 X 125 X 25
